Perform the following steps:

- define a directory in your laptop (ex: **tutorial**)
- if you don't have RStudio, install it (**https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/**)
- inside RStudio install SamplingStrata: **install.packages("SamplingStrata")**
- go to **//github.com/barcaroli**
- click on **SamplingStrata-Tutorial-uRos2019**
- click on **R code**
- right click on **SamplingStrataFunctions.R** and download the script in **tutorial** directory
- open **SamplingStrataFunctions.R** in RStudio
